data.title: Marie A. Prevost – August 3, 2024
data.text: Marie A. (Condrick) Prevost, entered into eternal life on August 3, 2024. Marie was a lifelong Weymouth native. Marie was a graduate of Sacred Heart grammar and high School in Weymouth and St Vincent’s Nursing School in Worcester. She received her BSN at Salem State College. Mrs. Prevost was a registered NICU nurse at St Elizabeth’s Hospital in Brighton and prior to that at St. Margaret’s Hospital in Dorchester. Beloved wife of Eugene J. Prevost. Devoted mother of Nicole Prevost and Michele Prevost both of Weymouth. Beloved twin sister of Betty Belyea and her husband Rodney of Braintree, Sister Eunice, Sisters of Saint Joseph of Framingham, Leo Condrick of Lindenhurst N.Y., and Joseph Condrick of Cornelius, North Carolina and the late Nora Hutchings. Aunt to several nieces and nephews. Funeral from the Clancy-Lucid Funeral Home on Friday, August 9 at 9:30 am. Funeral Mass in Our Lady Queen of Peace Parish at Sacred Heart Church Weymouth at 10:30 am. Relatives and friends are respectfully invited. Visiting hours on Thursday, August 8 from 5 until 8 pm. Burial Service to follow at Massachusetts National Cemetery Bourne at 1:30 PM. If desired, donations may be made in Marie’s memory to Massachusetts Teachers Association non-profit, The Mass Child, MTA Division of Communications, 2 Heritage Dr., 8th floor, Quincy, MA 02171.
